wikipedia_page.main: Brigadier Mark William Dunham  (born 1961) is a retired Royal Marines officer who served as the Deputy Commandant General. He was born in Lincolnshire in 1961.

response: * Bill Dunham (born 1961), former Deputy Commandant General of the Royal Marines
* Bill Dunham – former Deputy Commandant General of the Royal Marines

Reacting to Blackman's guilty verdict, Royal Marines Brigadier Bill Dunham called the murder a "shocking and appalling aberration" that was "not consistent with the ethos, values and standards of the Royal Marines", but was nevertheless an "isolated incident". General Sir Mike Jackson said he was "saddened" by the case.
